text: Armand Hammer United World College of the American West (UWC-USA) is an independent boarding school for students in high school in Montezuma, New Mexico, USA. UWC-USA was opened in 1982. Classes take place in a historic hotel and students live in buildings nearby. It is branch of an international school called United World College. UWC-USA is a high school that focuses on active learning and a worldwide community. People from all over the world study at this college. There are 200 students at the school in grades 11 and 12. ==Related pages== * New Mexico * Colleges and universities in New Mexico * United World College of South East Asia == References == ==Other websites== * UWC-USA's official website * United World Colleges homepage Category:Colleges and universities in New Mexico Category:1982 establishments in the United States
